meanings.definition: To represent or be a symbol of something.
meanings.sent1: The dove symbolises peace in many cultures.
meanings.sent2: The national flag symbolises the unity of our country.
meanings.sent3: The rainbow symbolises happiness after the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her smile symbolises the warmth of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse symbolises guidance in times of darkness.

meanings.definition: To stand for or suggest something else.
meanings.sent1: The red traffic light symbolises stop.
meanings.sent2: A white dress symbolises purity in some traditions.
meanings.sent3: His loud snoring symbolises a deep sleep.
meanings.sent4: The ringing bell symbolises the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The closed door symbolises privacy and solitude.
